summary: dark colorscheme, pleasant, mainly blue and blueish-green
name: oceandeep
description:
dark colorscheme, pleasant, mainly blue and blueish-green,
based on Nightshimmer (vimscript #328) by Niklas Lindstr√∂m (http://vim.sourceforge.net/profile.php?user_id=577);

You'll find a screenshot at my place over here:
http://www.tomsdiner.org/vim/oceandeep/index.html

Thanks for voting this up, I'm surprised and delighted that you like this scheme as much as I do :-)
install_details: In Vim 6 upwards, simply drop this into your "$VIMRUNTIME/colors/" or "$HOME/.vim/colors/", then use ":colorscheme oceandeep". Otherwise, just ":source" it.

versions.release_notes:
change by Alexei Alexandrov
- highlight CursorColumn
